description: A command-line tool that pops up a window prompting user interaction with a message and buttons.

message.title: Message
message.description: Pops a window prompting the user with MESSAGE. If MESSAGE is '-', it is read from stdin.

message_pause.title: Pause Message
message_pause.description: Same as -message to match the old prompt_user.

buttons.title: Button Labels
buttons.description: What do you want the buttons to say? You can give up to three -button for three buttons. Returns integer 1, 2, or 3. If there is no -button, there will be one button 'Ok'.

timeout.title: Timeout in seconds
timeout.description: Timeout in seconds of prompt message. Default answer is returned if TT seconds elapse without user input.
